Leiboff does Research
COGS RNAseqAbout LeiboffResearch

Welcome to the Leiboff Lab website! The lab officially opens in May 2020 at Oregon State.
We use a combination of gene expression analysis, image processing, classical and quantitative gentics to explore the way that different grasses make their agriculturally-critical organs.

A plant genomics data and code sharing website. Home of COGS RNAseq for maize tassel and sorghum panicle datasets.
